name: Nike Throwback
description:
The Nike Throwback Pullover is made with premium French terry fabric that blends a performance feel with a fit tailored for comfort. The asymmetrical tie-dye panel is inspired by an iconic team uniform from 1992.

  • Shown: College Navy/Pale Ivory
  • Style: CK6368-419

name: Nike Sportswear Swoosh
description:
The Nike Sportswear Hoodie provides a stylish fit for cool weather thanks to Swoosh branding at the chest, cuff, and back panel.

  • Shown: White/Volt
  • Style: CZ5569-100

name: Nike Dri-FIT Standard Issue
description:
Nike Basketball offers the Standard Issue Full-Zip Hoodie, part of a collection that combines the look of vintage sportswear with a modern performance feel. Relaxed and easy to wear, it's made from thick, soft French terry. Sweat-wicking Dri-FIT technology and flexible panels make it wearable on the court.

  • Shown: Team Orange/Pale Ivory
  • Style: CK6362-891

name: Nike Standard Issue
description:
The Nike Standard Issue Pullover Hoodie is made to play in and wear all day. The updated fabric gives it the look and feel of a lifestyle hoodie. Sweat-wicking Dri-FIT technology and flexible panels make it wearable on the court.

  • Shown: Chutney/Pale Ivory
  • Style: CV0864-712

name: Nike SB
description:
The Nike SB Hoodie pairs the laid-back look of tropical graphics with the soft feel of French terry for a casual vibe you can wear all day.

  • Shown: Limelight/Light Thistle
  • Style: CI6441-367

name: Nike Dri-FIT
description:
The Nike Dri-FIT Hoodie is made of soft fabric that feels smooth on the outside and extra soft against your skin. With sweat-wicking technology, you can stay dry and comfortable from your first stretch to your last set.

  • Shown: Black/Black/Hyper Crimson
  • Style: CJ4429-010

name: Nike ACG
description:
Stay covered on the trail with the Nike ACG Hoodie. An adjustable design couples with fleece fabric to help keep you going when unexpected weather hits.

  • Shown: String/Summit White
  • Style: CT6337-221

name: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
description:
A closet staple, the Nike Sportswear Club Fleece Pullover Hoodie gives you soft comfort in a street-ready style for an elevated, everyday look that you really can wear every day.

  • Shown: Orange Trance/Orange Trance
  • Style: BV2973-871

name: Nike Dri-FIT
description:
The Nike Dri-FIT Hoodie gives you just enough coverage to stay warm without overdoing it. Soft, sweat-wicking fabric helps you stay dry and comfortable from the court to the gym.

  • Shown: White/Lemon Venom/Black/Black
  • Style: CJ4746-100

name: Nike Yoga Dri-FIT
description:
The Nike Yoga Dri-FIT Hoodie is made with rich, soft knit fabric that has a little bit of stretch to keep you flowing freely. Sweat-wicking power helps keep you dry on the mat or to and from class.

  • Shown: Black/Black
  • Style: BV4022-010

name: Nike Sportswear JDI
description:
Made from soft French terry, the Nike Sportswear JDI Pullover Hoodie looks and feels like an old favorite with its subtle color-washed appearance and embroidered graphic for simple graphic style.

  • Shown: Cerulean/Cerulean
  • Style: CJ4566-424

name: Nike Sportswear Tech Fleece
description:
The Nike Sportswear Tech Fleece Hoodie updates a closet staple with the lightweight warmth of Nike Tech Fleece fabric. Designed with a 2-way zipper, it's a modern take on the classic hoodie.

  • Shown: Pueblo Red/Black
  • Style: 928483-603

name: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
description:
A closet staple, the Nike Sportswear Club Fleece Pullover Hoodie combines classic style with the soft comfort of fleece.

  • Shown: Bright Cactus/Bright Cactus/White
  • Style: BV2654-308

name: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
description:
The Nike Sportswear Club Fleece Hoodie combines soft fabric with simple street style that's versatile enough for everyday use. With a full zipper that goes to the chin, it's the perfect extra layer on a chilly day.

  • Shown: Cerulean/Cerulean/White
  • Style: BV2645-424

name: Nike Sportswear Club
description:
A closet staple, the Nike Sportswear Club Crew combines a classic embroidered logo on the left chest with the soft comfort of fleece for an elevated everyday look.

  • Shown: Midnight Navy/White
  • Style: BV2662-410
